tests.name: input1.txt
tests.run: java StringStats && echo "Displaying contents of file" && cat output.txt
tests.output:
Displaying contents of file
Shortest word: cat
Longest word: barbecue
Average word length: 5.167
Alphabetically first word: apple
Alphabetically last word: fire
